definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to walk (side part of split character)
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to pay back in full/to redeem a debt

sentences.english: They climb walls, leap off buildings and spy on enemies.
sentences.chinese: 它们会爬墙，能跳下大楼，还能暗中监视敌人。

sentences.english: As soon as you prove to be good, you will get more followers.
sentences.chinese: 如果事实证明你还不错，必定会有更多追随者。

sentences.english: I hadn't paid the telephone bill.
In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在后阶段，她们还配备了连发枪以及军棍和军刀。

sentences.english: And they protect against soil erosion by holding moisture in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 树木还能保持水分防止土壤侵蚀。

sentences.english: No buts. You tin melodrama extinction afterward.
sentences.chinese: 别说可是，还轮不到你绝种呢。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司还经营化学产品和家产品进出口的业务。

sentences.english: Eco-fashion has certainly proved that it has enough caché in the fashion world.
sentences.chinese: 生态时装还证明它在时尚界有着足够的影响力。

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，风水还与占数学的原理结合起来使用。

sentences.english: This is my first stand-alone blog , and it's still under construction.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的第一个独立博客，还在建设中。

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 还可吃一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸气的饮料。

sentences.english: Some day his pictures will be worth more than all you have in your shop.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，他的画会比你店里所有的一切还值钱。

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 该集团还推出了太阳镜和化妆品等新的副产品。

sentences.english: Scientists don't yet know what the effects of those reactions might be.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们还不清楚这些反应会具体产生什么样的结果。

sentences.english: Pooling in the pelvic cavity. Which means her heart was stillpumping.
sentences.chinese: 骨盆腔有血液淤积，说明当时她的心脏还在跳动。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
